title: Christmas Message to the Team from CEO Saffa Andrew Koroma
excerpt: A heartfelt Christmas and New Year message from CEO Saffa Andrew Koroma to the CArCRT team, celebrating dedication, unity, and hope.
content:
Dear Team,
As we celebrate this joyful season, I want to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude to each of you. Your dedication, resilience, and teamwork throughout the year have been the driving force behind our successes and the impact we continue to make in our communities.
Christmas reminds us of the power of hope, unity, and generosity. These values are at the core of our mission, and I am proud to see them reflected in the way you serve, support, and inspire others every day.
May this festive season bring peace, joy, and renewal to you and your families. As we step into the new year, let us carry forward the spirit of collaboration and excellence, knowing that together we can achieve even greater milestones.
Thank you for your commitment and for being an integral part of this journey.
Wishing you all a Merry Christmas and a prosperous New Year filled with blessings and opportunities.

SAFFA ANDREW KOROMA
Chief Executive Officer.
